lead_paragraph: Marcus Smith has been named the president and general manager of Lowe’s Motor Speedway, replacing Humpy Wheeler. Smith’s father, Bruton Smith, who owns Speedway Motorsports Inc., made the announcement. Wheeler retired last week after 33 years of running Lowe’s in Concord, N.C.
